availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James D. Elliston (Grant County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Ellen Elliston. Father of Lucy A. Elliston, James K. Polk Elliston, George M. D. Elliston, Sarah A. Elliston, and William P. Elliston. Farmer in Grant County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Grant County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 324A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 895.
Find A Grave, "James D. Elliston (Dec 4, 1819-Aug 7, 1895)," Memorial #21366875, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/21366875 (accessed May 3, 2020).
